message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.DS, cs.MA, cs.GT 

This paper is about designing an online learning algorithm for optimizing revenue in online advertising by learning the demand model and subsequently solving the optimization problem. This involves sequential experimentation and interleaving learning and optimization. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.IR (Information Retrieval) and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) as these sub-categories are closely related to the problem of online learning and optimization. Additionally, cs.MA (Multi-Agent Systems) and cs.GT (Game Theory) are also possible sub-categories as they deal with decision-making in complex systems and optimization in strategic settings, which are relevant to the problem of online advertising.
